vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Egypt (H4714), first mentioned at Gen.10.13; along with Ludim (H3866), Anamim (H6047), Naphtuhim (H5320), Pathrusim (H6625), Casluhim (H3695) and Caphtorim (H3732)
§ Lehabim = "flames"
an Egyptian tribe descended from Mizraim
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利哈比人 这个陽性名詞在原文的意思是 "火焰"
一個埃及的部落, 是麥西的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利哈比人 这个阳性名词在原文的意思是 "火焰"
一个埃及的部落, 是麦西的后裔
